events.message: I am filing a claim following a car accident that occurred last night involving a collision with another vehicle at the intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to your claim to assist with the process and answer any questions related to the car accident.
We have acknowledged receipt of your claim and are starting to process your car accident case promptly.
Please submit a copy of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and your driver's license for further evaluation.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle pictures have been uploaded to your claim file successfully.
The investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence and details concerning the car collision claim.
The investigation into the accident has been completed; all factors concerning the collision have been thoroughly examined.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and claim coverage for your vehicle after the accident.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement and appreciate your cooperation during this process.
Your claim has been approved. We will move forward with the agreed settlement amount related to your auto accident.
The payment for your claim settlement has been successfully issued and should reflect in your account within 3 business days.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed following payment issuance and completion of all required steps.
The records of your closed claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
